parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the closest location of specified class to a given position.<br>Checked range is unlimited (i.e. covers the whole map).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[nearestLocation]] [position, locationClass]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [position, locationClass]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[Object]] or [[Array]] in format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> locationClass: [[String]] of a location class name. If "" is supplied, any nearest location is returned. See [[Location#Location Types|Location Types]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Location]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_nearestCity = [[nearestLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] [[player]], "nameCity"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_anyNearestLocation = [[nearestLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]], ""];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[findNearestEnemy]], [[nearestBuilding]], [[nearestObject]], [[nearestObjects]], [[nearObjects]], [[nearEntities]], [[nearTargets]], [[nearSupplies]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]], [[nearObjectsReady]], [[nearRoads]], [[Location#Location Types|Location Types]], [[locationPosition]], [[nearestLocations]], [[createLocation]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
